H0.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. Taiwan

H1.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. Mongolia

H2.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. Korea

H3.text: The Han ethnic people constitute c.90% of mainland. 中国

A4.text: The Han Chinese represent 91.11% of the population in China

A5.text: Han Chinese... constitute over 95% of the population in Taiwan

A6.text: The Han Chinese constitute 91.51% of the total population in 2010

A7.text: The Han Chinese – the world's largest single ethnic group – outnumber other ethnic groups in every place excluding Tibet, Xinjiang, Linxia, and autonomous prefectures like Xishuangbanna

A8.text: Ethnic minorities account for less than 10% of the population of China, according to the 2020 census
